answers.author: Ali Miller Richards
answers.text:
Hi Maria, You can renew Harold's membership online at http://icma.org/renew, e-mail membership@icma.org to request a new invoice, or call into our Member & Customer Support Center at 1-800-745-8780. I will call you directly for more information.


Hi Maria, You can renew Harold's membership online at http://icma.org/renew, e-mail membership@icma.org to request a new invoice, or call into our Member & Customer Support Center at 1-800-745-8780. I will call you directly for more information.

author: Maria Tostado
text:
Good morning,
We have a new city manager that came from Texas where he was a member of ICMA. We would like to continue Harold's membership here at the City of Longmont. Please let me know what I need to do?
Harold Dominguez, City Manager of City of Longmont, Colorado.
In January of 2012 he was City Manager in St. Angelo, Texas.
Thank you,
Maria Tostado
350 Kimbark Street
Longmont, CO 80501
303-651-8601
title: Transfer membership or create new?
